TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ConfigurationManager extends System.Object
public ref class ConfigurationManager abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供对客户端应用程序配置文件的访问。

span.span: Provides access to configuration files for client applications.
This class cannot be inherited.

block.para:
类实现编辑配置文件的编程访问。
The class enables programmatic access for editing configuration files.
使用提供的打开方法之一。
You use one of the Open methods provided by .
这些方法返回对象，它又提供所需的方法和属性，以处理基础的配置文件。
These methods return a object, which in turn provides the required methods and properties to handle the underlying configuration files.
你可以访问这些文件进行读取或写入。
You can access these files for reading or writing.
若要读取的配置文件，使用或读取配置信息。
To read the configuration files, use or to read configuration information.
用户或读取的进程必须具有以下权限：
The user or process that reads must have the following permissions:
- 读取当前配置层次结构级别上对配置文件的权限。Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 读取所有父权限配置文件。Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.如果你的应用程序需要其自己的配置只读访问，我们建议你使用方法。If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, we recommend that you use the method.此方法提供的访问有关当前应用程序的缓存的配置值，其中具有更好的性能比类。This method provides access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.若要写入的配置文件，请使用之一方法。To write to the configuration files, use one of the methods.用户或写入的进程必须具有以下权限：The user or process that writes must have the following permissions:
- 写入权限的配置文件和当前配置层次结构级别上的目录。Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 对所有配置文件读取权限。Read permissions on all the configuration files.

summary.span: 获取当前应用程序默认配置的 数据。

span.span: Gets the data for the current application's default configuration.

value.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象包含当前应用程序默认配置的 对象的内容。

span.span: Returns a object that contains the contents of the object for the current application's default configuration.

exception.span: 未能使用应用程序设置数据检索 对象。

span.span: Could not retrieve a object with the application settings data.

span.span: The configuration section path and name.

summary.span: 检索当前应用程序默认配置的指定配置节。

span.span: Retrieves a specified configuration section for the current application's default configuration.

returns.span: 指定的 对象，或者，如果该节不存在，则为 。

span.span: The specified object, or if the section does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于客户端应用程序，此方法检索通过合并应用程序配置文件、 本地用户配置文件中，和漫游配置文件获取配置文件。For client applications, this method retrieves a configuration file obtained by merging the application configuration file, the local user configuration file, and the roaming configuration file. 方法中访问它不能更改的运行时配置信息。The method accesses run-time configuration information that it cannot change. 若要更改的配置，请使用对你通过使用以下打开方法之一来获取的配置文件的方法：To change the configuration, you use the method on the configuration file that you obtain by using one of the following Open methods: - - - - ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。The example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/CS/configurationmanager.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/VB/configurationmanager.vb#7)]

span.span: A configuration file could not be loaded.

para.span: 您必须强制转换为预期的配置类型的返回值。

span.span: You must cast the return value to the expected configuration type.

para.span: 若要避免可能出现的转换异常，应使用条件的强制转换操作，如C# 或 Visual Basic 中的函数中的运算符。

span.span: To avoid possible casting exceptions, you should use a conditional casting operation such as the operator in C# or the function in Visual Basic.

summary.span: 将指定的客户端配置文件作为 对象打开。

span.span: Opens the specified client configuration file as a object.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Configuration.Configuration OpenExeConfiguration (System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel userLevel);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Configuration.Configuration OpenExeConfiguration(valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationUserLevel userLevel) cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenExeConfiguration (userLevel As ConfigurationUserLevel) As Configuration
public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenExeConfiguration(System::Configuration::ConfigurationUserLevel userLevel);

span.span: The for which you are opening the configuration.

summary.span: 将当前应用程序的配置文件作为 对象打开。

span.span: Opens the configuration file for the current application as a object.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端应用程序使用适用于所有用户、 应用于单个用户的单独配置和应用于漫游用户配置的全局配置。Client applications use a global configuration that applies to all users, separate configurations that apply to individual users, and configurations that apply to roaming users. `userLevel`参数确定它是否具有用户级别 （配置文件位于应用程序所在的目录中） 通过指示所打开的配置文件的位置或每用户级别 (正在配置文件应用程序设置路径由用户级别）。The `userLevel` parameter determines the location of the configuration file being opened by indicating whether it has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path determined by the user level). 指定的值的配置通过传递以下项之一来获取`userLevel`:Specify which configuration to get by passing one of the following values for `userLevel`: - 若要获取对象，适用于所有用户设置`userLevel`到。To get the object that applies to all users, set `userLevel` to . - 若要获取本地对象，适用于当前用户，设置`userLevel`到。To get the local object that applies to the current user, set `userLevel` to . - 若要获取漫游对象，适用于当前用户，设置`userLevel`到。To get the roaming object that applies to the current user, set `userLevel` to . > [!NOTE] > 若要获取对象有关的资源，你的代码必须具有读取权限设置所继承的所有配置文件。To get the object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新的配置文件，你的代码还必须具有的配置文件和它所在的目录的写入权限。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/CS/configurationmanager.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/VB/configurationmanager.vb#5)]

span.span: A configuration file could not be loaded.

summary.span: 将指定的客户端配置文件作为 对象打开。

span.span: Opens the specified client configuration file as a object.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端应用程序使用适用于所有用户、 应用于单个用户的单独配置和应用于漫游用户配置的全局配置。Client applications use a global configuration that applies to all users, separate configurations that apply to individual users, and configurations that apply to roaming users. `userLevel`值确定所打开的配置文件的位置。The `userLevel` value determines the location of the configuration file being opened. 它指示它是否具有用户级别 （配置文件位于应用程序所在的目录中） 或每用户级别 （配置文件是由用户级别类型的应用程序设置路径中。）。It indicates whether it has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path determined by the user level type.). 调用此方法重载与调用 重载并将 `preLoad` 参数设置为 `false` 等效。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the overload with the `preLoad` parameter set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/CS/configurationmanager.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/VB/configurationmanager.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Configuration.Configuration OpenMachineConfiguration ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Configuration.Configuration OpenMachineConfiguration() cil managed
Public Shared Function OpenMachineConfiguration () As Configuration
public: static System::Configuration::Configuration ^ OpenMachineConfiguration();

summary.span: 将当前计算机上的计算机配置文件作为 对象打开。

span.span: Opens the machine configuration file on the current computer as a object.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 机配置设置将应用于整个计算机和驻留在其上的所有应用程序，除非被覆盖的本地应用程序。Machine configuration settings apply to the whole computer and all applications that reside on it, unless overridden for the local application. 将从当前正在运行版本的.NET Framework 的 Machine.config 文件中读取机配置设置。Machine configuration settings are read from the Machine.config file of the currently running version of the .NET Framework. Machine.config 文件位于以下子目录：The Machine.config file is located in the following subdirectory: *%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config*%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config > [!NOTE] > 若要获取对象有关的资源，你的代码必须具有读取权限设置所继承的所有配置文件。To obtain the object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新的配置文件，你的代码还必须具有的配置文件和它所在的目录的写入权限。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. 不能访问其他版本的.NET Framework 可能已安装在计算机上的 Machine.config 文件。It is not possible to access the Machine.config file for other versions of the .NET Framework that might be installed on the computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来获取配置文件中包含的所有部分。The following code example shows how to use the method to obtain all sections that are contained in the configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/CS/configurationmanager.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/VB/configurationmanager.vb#4)]

span.span: A configuration file could not be loaded.

param.name: fileMap
param.span: 一个 对象，该对象引用代替应用程序的默认配置文件使用的配置文件。

span.span: An object that references configuration file to use instead of the application default configuration file.

param.name: userLevel
param.span: 要打开配置的 对象。

span.span: The object for which you are opening the configuration.

summary.span: 可将指定的客户端配置文件作为使用指定文件映射和用户级别的 对象打开。

span.span: Opens the specified client configuration file as a object that uses the specified file mapping and user level.
The configuration object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象确定所打开的配置文件的位置。The object determines the location of the configuration file being opened. 它指示文件是否具有用户级别 （配置文件位于应用程序所在的目录中） 或每用户级别 (配置文件是在应用程序的设置路径由`userLevel`)。It indicates whether the file has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path determined by `userLevel`). > [!NOTE] > 若要获取对象有关的资源，你的代码必须具有读取权限设置所继承的所有配置文件。To obtain the object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新的配置文件，你的代码还必须具有的配置文件和它所在的目录的写入权限。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来获取所包含的配置文件的所有部分。The following code example shows how to use the method to obtain all sections that are contained by the configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/CS/configurationmanager.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/VB/configurationmanager.vb#9)]

span.span: A configuration file could not be loaded.

param.span: 一个 对象，该对象引用代替应用程序的默认配置文件使用的配置文件。

span.span: An object that references the configuration file to use instead of the default application configuration file.

param.span: 要打开配置的 对象。

param.span: 如果预加载所有部分团队和部分，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 可将指定的客户端配置文件作为使用指定文件映射、用户级别和预加载选项的 对象打开。

span.span: Opens the specified client configuration file as a object that uses the specified file mapping, user level, and preload option.
The configuration object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象确定将打开的配置文件的位置。The object determines the location of the configuration file that is being opened. 它指示该文件是否具有用户级别（此配置文件位于应用程序所在的目录中）或每用户级别（此配置文件位于由 `userLevel` 决定的应用程序设置路径中）。It indicates whether the file has no user level (the configuration file is in the same directory as the application) or has a per-user level (the configuration file is in an application settings path that is determined by `userLevel`). > [!NOTE] > 若要获取对象有关的资源，你的代码必须具有读取权限设置所继承的所有配置文件。To obtain the object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新的配置文件，你的代码还必须具有的配置文件和它所在的目录的写入权限。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. 有关示例代码，请参见 重载。For a code example, see the overload.

span.span: A configuration file could not be loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 机配置设置将应用于整个计算机和驻留在其上的所有应用程序，除非被覆盖的本地应用程序。Machine configuration settings apply to the whole computer and all applications that reside on it, unless overridden for the local application. 将从当前正在运行版本的.NET Framework 的 Machine.config 文件中读取机配置设置。Machine configuration settings are read from the Machine.config file of the currently running version of the .NET Framework. Machine.config 文件位于以下子目录：The Machine.config file is located in the following subdirectory: *%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config*%windir%*\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\*version*\config > [!NOTE] > 若要获取对象有关的资源，你的代码必须具有读取权限设置所继承的所有配置文件。To obtain the object for a resource, your code must have read permissions on all the configuration files from which it inherits settings. 若要更新的配置文件，你的代码还必须具有的配置文件和它所在的目录的写入权限。To update a configuration file, your code must additionally have write permissions for both the configuration file and the directory in which it exists. 不能访问其他版本的.NET Framework 可能已安装在计算机上的 Machine.config 文件。It is not possible to access the Machine.config file for other versions of the .NET Framework that might be installed on the computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来获取配置文件中的所有部分。The following code example shows how to use the method to obtain all sections in the configuration file. MemberSignature.Value: public static void RefreshSection (string sectionName);
.method public static hidebysig void RefreshSection(string sectionName) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RefreshSection (sectionName As String)
public: static void RefreshSection(System::String ^ sectionName);

param.name: sectionName
param.span: 要刷新的节的配置节名称或配置路径和节名称。

span.span: The configuration section name or the configuration path and section name of the section to refresh.

summary.span: 刷新命名节，这样在下次检索它时将从磁盘重新读取它。

span.span: Refreshes the named section so the next time that it is retrieved it will be re-read from disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使缓存中的用于指定的配置节无效而不会影响其他部分。This method invalidates the cache for the specified configuration section without affecting other sections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来刷新应用程序设置配置节。The following code example shows how to use the method to refresh the application settings configuration section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/CS/configurationmanager.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager/VB/configurationmanager.vb#7)]
